p:
Total RNA was isolated from homogenized mosquitoes using an RNeasy Mini Kit (74106, Qiagen) and reverse transcribed into complementary DNA (cDNA) using an iScript cDNA Synthesis Kit (170-8890, Bio-Rad). Viral genomes were quantified via qPCR amplification of ZIKV, DENV, BATV, and SINV genes. The viral genomic copies were normalized by a standard curve
40 . In each subsequent RT-qPCR plate sample, we quantified four standard aliquot dilutions to adjust for threshold variation between plates. The primers and probes used for this analysis are shown in Supplementary TableÂ 5.
